```
title:	Implement bidirectional interactive mode
state:	OPEN
author:	konard
labels:	documentation, enhancement
comments:	0
assignees:	
projects:	
milestone:	
number:	817
--
Current `--interactive-mode` is read only.

But we can also monitor for comments in pull request when `--interactive-mode` is enabled.

And queue all pull requests comments as input for `claude` tool, like explored in https://github.com/link-assistant/hive-mind/issues/814

Meaning if user will add new comments during working session which are not comments from our system (created via interactive mode) we should use the comments as input for the model, giving for it queued feedback, so as soon as it finishes with current work, it will be able to address the feedback from the user.
```

</details>

```
Please download all data related about the issue to this repository, make sure we compile that data to `./docs/case-studies` folder, and use it to do deep case study analysis, and propose possible solutions.
```
